pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTelemetry Datadog Span Exporter===================================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-exporter-datadog.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-exporter-datadog/This library allows to export tracing data to `Datadog<https://www.datadoghq.com/>`_. OpenTelemetry span event and links are notsupported... warning:: This exporter has been deprecated. To export your OTLP traces from OpenTelemetry SDK directly to Datadog Agent, please refer to `OTLP Ingest in Datadog Agent <https://docs.datadoghq.com/tracing/setup_overview/open_standards/#otlp-ingest-in-datadog-agent>`_ .Installation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-exporter-datadog.. _Datadog: https://www.datadoghq.com/.. _OpenTelemetry: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-python/References----------* `Datadog <https://www.datadoghq.com/>`_* `OpenTelemetry Project <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_
